originalfilename:
Original clip filename with corresponding extension.
(example: clip123.mov)
title: Title of your clip that will appear on Pond5. The character limit is 80.
description: Description of your clip that will appear on Pond5. The character limit is 2000.
keywords: Keywords for your clip. You can use up to 50 keywords. They must be seperated by commas.
specifysource: free text - camera model or software
release:
If you have a release fill out exact filenames with extensions seperated by commas
(example: johnrelease.jpg, janerelease.jpg, childrelease.jpg)
setpriceforme: Write 1 if you wish for us to set price for you.
pricelarge: Downconverted price for HD files when original is 4k.
